name: Beat Blaster for Oculus Quest 90FPS DEMO
name_original: Beat Blaster for Oculus Quest 90FPS DEMO
description:
Beat Blaster is an Oculus Quest game of shooting, running, and dodging where everything happens to the music rhythm at a spectacular 90fps.

 An original mix of styles where each game will offer you a new challenge.

SONGS & AMBISONIC AUDIO

Each level introduces a novelty, and all the games are different thanks to the intelligent generation of levels. 

Ambisonic sound lets you experience the music in an entirely new way.

3 WAYS OF MOVEMENT

You can choose between the classic VR controller, tilting the head, or the intuitive and original control based on the head's movement. 

NO MOTION SICKNESS

Beat Blaster is a VR game with a high-speed component. But all the game moves are designed without rotating the player, thus minimizing the probability of motion sickness.

EASY RULES

To clear a level, you must reach the end of the song without dying. You have a Blaster with infinite ammunition and single life to dodge or kill all the enemies that will appear to the music's rhythm.

NOTE:  This free DEMO version includes the first 3 levels. The full version will be released in AppLav with 30 levels, leaderboards, and other features.
